data.title: Original Alphabet Murders, The (1966) movie poster in VG condition for $35.00
data.meta_description: Original  movie poster for ALPHABET MURDERS, THE (1966) 11005   Anita Ekberg   Tony Randall Movie Poster Original U.S. One-Sheet Poster (27x41) Folded  Fine Plus Condition Offered by Kirby McDaniel MovieArt of Austin, Texas.
data.text:
Original U.S. One-Sheet Poster (27x41) Folded Fine Plus Condition

Original MGM U.S. One-Sheet Poster (27x41) for the Frank Tashlin directed mystery-comedy THE ALPHABET MURDERS (1965). Based on an Agatha Christie book "The A.B.C. Murders", the film stars blonde bombshell Anita Ekberg and perennial nebbish Tony Randall. Also look for Robert Morley, Guy Rolfe, Julian Glover and Richard Wattis. This poster was used in a theater, and shows some signs of gentle wear. We have graded it in fine plus condition. MovieArt Original Film Posters in Austin, Texas guarantees that this poster is an authentic U.S. one-sheet for this film. MovieArt Austin does not sell reproductions.

Tony Randall - Actor

Anita Ekberg - Actor

FRANK TASHLIN - Director

Robert Morley - Actor

Guy Rolfe - Actor

Julian Glover - Actor

Richard Wattis - Actor
